snippet: A radiation leak at the government’s nuclear dump has been linked to a waste container shipped from Los Alamos National Laboratory, officials said Friday.
abstract: Radiation leak at the government’s nuclear dump in New Mexico is linked to waste container shipped from Los Alamos National Laboratory; leak raises questions about the safety of other barrels being stored on the laboratory’s northern campus and at a temporary site in West Texas.
lead_paragraph: A radiation leak at the government’s nuclear dump has been linked to a waste container shipped from Los Alamos National Laboratory, officials said Friday.

headline.main: New Mexico: Source of Radiation Leak Found
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Source of Radiation Leak Found
